mapper.insert:
insert into ofin.lianjia_hang_process( quotation_id, residence_id, property_type_id, floor_structure_id, quotation_total_price, quotation_unit_price, quotation_date, property_area, basement_area, total_floor, place_floor, property_room ) VALUES
( #{b.quotationId}, #{b.residenceId}, #{b.propertyTypeId}, #{b.floorStructureId}, #{b.totalPrice}, #{b.unitPrice}, #{b.quotationDate}, #{b.propertyArea}, #{b.basementArea}, #{b.totalFloor}, #{b.placeFloor}, #{b.propertyRoom} )
